TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpVersion extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines the HTTP version numbers that are supported by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> classes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The HttpVersion class defines the HTTP versions that are supported by the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.HttpWebResponse> classes. The HTTP version number is used to control version-specific features of HTTP, such as pipelining and chunking.
## Examples The following example demonstrates the use of HttpVersion.
[!code-cs[HttpVersion_Version10#1](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.net.httpversion_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[HttpVersion_Version10#1](../../add/codesnippet/CPP/t-system.net.httpversion_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[HttpVersion_Version10#1](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.net.httpversion_1.vb)]
